senses: [{"definition":"Heaven.","example":null},{"definition":"Something, especially a person's name in legal documents, that appears higher on the same page or on a preceding page.","example":null},{"definition":"Higher authority.","example":null},{"definition":"Betterment, raised status or condition.","example":null},{"definition":"Of heaven; heavenly.","example":null},{"definition":"(by ellipsis) Being located higher on the same page or on a preceding page.","example":null},{"definition":"Directly overhead; vertically on top of.","example":null},{"definition":"Higher in the same page; earlier in the order as far as writing products go.","example":null},{"definition":"Into or from heaven; in the sky.","example":"He's in a better place now, floating free as the clouds above."},{"definition":"In a higher place; upstairs; farther upstream.","example":null},{"definition":"Higher in rank, power, or position.","example":"He appealed to the court above."},{"definition":"In addition.","example":null},{"definition":"More in number.","example":null},{"definition":"Above zero; above freezing.","example":"It was a cold day at only 5 above."},{"definition":"On the upper half or the dorsal surface of an animal.","example":"The sparrow I saw was rufous above and off-white below."},{"definition":"Physically over; on top of; worn on top of, said of clothing.","example":"He always put his coat on above his sweater."},{"definition":"In or to a higher place; higher than; on or over the upper surface.","example":null},{"definition":"Farther north than.","example":"Idaho is above Utah."},{"definition":"Rising; appearing out of reach height-wise.","example":null},{"definition":"Higher than; superior to in any respect; surpassing; higher in measure, degree, volume, or pitch, etc. than; out of reach; not exposed to; not likely to be affected by; incapable of negative actions or thoughts.","example":"Even the chief of police is not above suspicion."},{"definition":"Higher in rank, status, or position.","example":"to stand head and shoulders above the rest"},{"definition":"In addition to; besides.","example":"above and beyond the call of duty"},{"definition":"Surpassing in number or quantity; more than.","example":"That amount is way above our asking price."},{"definition":"In preference to.","example":null},{"definition":"Too proud to stoop to; averse to; disinclined towards;","example":"The owner was above taking more than a token salary."},{"definition":"Beyond; on the other side.","example":null},{"definition":"Upstage of.","example":null}]
